class.name: OScriptNodeEmitSignal
class.description:
The [OScriptNodeEmitSignal] node allows for emitting a [Signal] defined in the orchestration. This is equivalent to: [codeblock] signal my_signal(data: int)
func _ready(): emit_signal("my_signal", 25) [/codeblock] While emitting an orchestration signal can be added using the [param All Actions] window, users can also drag the signal from the [param Signal] component panel onto the orchestration.
